{{cpp/iterator/move_sentinel/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/iterator/move_sentinel/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class S2 &gt;
    requires std::assignable_from&lt;S&amp;, const S2&amp;&gt;
        constexpr move_sentinel&amp; operator=( const std::move_sentinel&lt;S2&gt;&amp; other );
}}
{{dcl end}}

The underlying sentinel is assigned the value of the underlying sentinel of {{c|other}}, i.e. {{c|other.base()}}.
